description: Slender, fit Nikko Russo is desperately in need of a job since his wife has been bitching him out for being lazy, so he embarks on an online search, but quits soon thereafter for a nap. Meanwhile, the delivery guy, tattooed, chiseled Pierre Fitch drops off a package only to find brown-haired Nikko in the living room laid out on the couch. He pulls his erect dick out and slides his eager mouth right onto it until he’s throat fucking him. Sexy Pierre doesn’t hold back as he rims his ass, and enters his tight hole.
title: Afternoon Nap? Try Delight
